description: User successfully submits the waitlist signup form (member or host)
User opens the join modal to view signup options
User clicks 'Become a Member' button to start member signup flow
User clicks 'Become a Host' button to start host signup flow
User likes an event in the carousel
User unlikes a previously liked event
User clicks to initiate Stripe checkout
User clicks sign in button to authenticate
Server-side: Stripe checkout session successfully created
Server-side: Stripe webhook confirms successful payment/subscription
Server-side: User subscription has been cancelled
Server-side: New lead (member or host) successfully saved to database
Server-side: Welcome email successfully sent to new lead
Application error occurred and error boundary was shown to user
